dbi.BaseResult

class BaseResult: dbi.Result.Result;
All DBI Result classes should inherit from BaseResult instead of Result directly. This class will provide a default implementation of fetchAll() which seems to work on all DBI drivers.

See Also:
Result

Row fetchRow();
Throws:
DBIException if the function isn't overridden.

Row[] fetchAll();
Fetch all results returning an array of Row objects.

Returns:
The retrieved rows.

void finish();
Throws:
DBIException if the function isn't overridden.
